user_query: I have been researching ways to reduce my carbon footprint. Can you calculate the CO2e emissions from my consumption of traditional hydro energy in the UK? Additionally, suggest some eco-friendly alternatives to motorbikes and provide me with the nutritional information of plant-based diets.

TaskList.description: Calculate the CO2e emissions from the consumption of traditional hydro energy in the UK.
Provide nutritional information for common plant-based diets.
